short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy Merch Research is a toolkit that improves your Merch on Demand product management and research.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy Merch Research Chrome Extension 

Simplify your product research on Amazon with a tool designed to collect and organize product data directly in your browser—no subscriptions, no external servers, just efficient data gathering and management.

Key Features:
Fast Data Retrieval: Collect product details from Amazon marketplaces quickly.
Customizable Search Options: Use keywords, hidden terms, and market filters to refine results.
Local Data Storage: All data is stored in your browser for easy access and enhanced privacy.
Export & Import: Export data to CSV files or import existing research seamlessly.
How to Use:
Install the Extension: Add Easy Merch Research to your Chrome browser.
Browse Amazon: Visit supported Amazon marketplaces (US, UK, DE, ES, FR, IT).
Open the Research Interface: Click the extension icon to launch the tool.
Customize Your Search: Adjust keywords, markets, and other settings.
Collect and Manage Data: Save, filter, and export data with a few clicks.
Supported Markets and Products:
Markets: US, UK, DE, ES, FR, IT
Products: T-shirts, Hoodies, Sweatshirts, Tank Tops, Tumblers, and more
Important Information:
This extension focuses on data collection and does not provide trend analysis or profitability insights.
All data is stored locally, ensuring user privacy without relying on external servers.

Take control of your Amazon product research with Easy Merch Research—simple, fast, and secure.

This version removes promotional language and emphasizes the tool’s functionality while adhering to Chrome Web Store guidelines. 

Does this meet your needs?

Please note: Development on this extension will be paused for a while. It will still function, but updates may not be released until [06/25/2025].
